title: Why don't people upgrade trinkets?
body: It's 250g and it's incredibly valuable. I try to get it the first back after level 9.

replies.body:

>
> Because bronzes don't appreciate wards

It's not just a problem in bronze, happens in my soloQ games, and it happens it challenger matches than I spectate.

250g is a lot early game and 250g for wards late-game is often un-necessary.

Most often if I've not upgraded it, it's because I've not had the chance while trying to get an item completed.
Then there are the moments where I forget.

Hell I keep forgetting to switch from a Warding Totem once I get my SightStone when I play as Support. That one out right pisses me off each time.
I just forget, or there's a more wanted item. like if I could get upgraded trinket or finish triforce, I'd finish triforce.
Usually i just forget to upgrade it, only upgrading super late game or if it gets pointed out to me

If I was to take an actual guess it's because many people to do strategically back but recall when they have X amount of money to buy and EXACT item they had in mind. People also forget/undervalue it.

Very good question Batchy. I upgrade mine asap after hitting level 9. Free sightstones are welcome in my inventory.
